snippet: John Draper, the director of the National Suicide Prevention Lifeline, responds to a news article.
abstract: Letter from John Draper, director, National Suicide Prevention Lifeline, responds to Aug 7 article about study finding that exposure to combat is not major cause in rise of military suicides.
lead_paragraph: John Draper, the director of the National Suicide Prevention Lifeline, responds to a news article.
